item.title: Was Jesus a Roman Hoax to Trick the Jews? | VICE | United States
item.description:
Was Jesus a Roman Hoax to Trick the Jews? | VICE | United States

Image via Joe Atwill has been really pissing off Christians and historians this week, which is understandable considering that he's making claims that undermine the foundation of the former's beliefs and the latter's widely accepted truths.
